Re: B&H 'tiny strip of coastline.' That's debatable. They have part of a bay, but both ends of the bay belong to Croatia. Croatia borders Montenegro, which tripped me up on Travle a few times. 95% of the Bay of Ploče-Trpanj belongs to Croatia, and the B&H access to the Bay is 40km from the mouth. (It's like asking whether Pennsylvania is 'coastal', even though the Delaware Bay is split between DE and NJ; PA's access begins 110 km from the Atlantic mouth of the Bay.)

El Salvador' begins with 'S' in the same way that 'The United States' begins with 'U' and 'The Bahamas' begins with 'B'. There is some discussion about whether grammatical articles are integral parts of the name, but they are generally omitted from alphabetical listings. The only time we alphabetize the article is when it is a truly integral part of the word ('ALgeria' / 'الجزائر'). [ANSWER: We try to use shortened names when possible, the most recognizable name by the majority of players, otherwise people would comply when asking for Starts with E and El Salvador not being valid]

I'd recommend editing the definition of 'dependent territory', from 'does not possess full political independence as a state and remains politically outside the controlling state's integral area.' Second, Hawaii is further from the 'integral area' of the United States - and of the American landmass - than Puerto Rico is. According to this definition, Hawaii should be considered a 'dependent territory'. [ANSWER: We have used Wikipedia definition with some tweaks! Afghanistan (2013-2021) doesn’t count for death penalty, even though execution still occurred during this time - noteworthy instances include October 2014, when five men were executed by hanging for robbery, and May 2016, when six men were executed by hanging for terrorism.
